action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a collection of block-like shapes in various colors, including red, purple, yellow, and orange. These shapes are arranged in a seemingly random fashion, with no discernible pattern or sequence. The shapes are simple and geometric, resembling letters or symbols, but they do not form any recognizable words or characters. The background is plain and white, which makes the colors of the shapes stand out. There is no additional context or background story provided within the image itself.
continue
